Texts.Eng: Excellent. This will be quite useful, and goes quite appreciated. Take this, and perhaps you can get more use out of it than I ever could.
Texts.Chs: 优秀。这真的非常有用。拿着这个，也许它可以在你手中发挥更多用处。

Texts.Eng: I could use some ^orange;methanol^white; but don't have the materials handy. Bring me ^orange;10 methanol^reset; and I'll toss you something useful in return. Not a grenade. Promise.
Texts.Chs: 我正需要到一些^orange;甲醇^white;，但我手边没有合适的材料来制作它。请把^orange;10份甲醇^reset;带给我，我会给你一些有用的奖励，我保证是有用的奖励，而不是一颗手榴弹。
